findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: Contract owner can delay sell transactions for all users, excluding themselves.

findings.title: STC - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: ERC20 specification not followed regarding transfer methods success checks.

findings.title: BLC - Business Logic Concern
findings.description: Unclear business logic implementation regarding auto LP burn percent.

findings.title: CR - Code Repetition
findings.description: Repetitive code segments in contract increasing code size unnecessarily.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions not called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Non-changing state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity naming conventions not followed in various variables and functions.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Critical arithmetic parameters lack event emissions for tracking off-chain changes.

findings.title: L08 - Tautology or Contradiction
findings.description: Expressions with tautologies or contradictions detected in the contract.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Unused functions increase code size unnecessarily.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Division operations preceding multiplication may lead to loss of precision.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Local variables with same names as upper-scoped variables cause confusion.
